content.body: Domenic Do you mind if I start working on https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/7996? It took me a while to understand how "wait until it asynchronously complete" and "custom perform the fetch steps" work, and I would be happy to help replacing them with more explicit constructs.

It took me a while to understand how "wait until it asynchronously complete" and "custom perform the fetch steps" work, and I would be happy to help replacing them with more explicit constructs.
